text: Andrey Gennadyevich Makeyev (; 3 February 1952 – 13 September 2021Умер бронзовый призер Олимпиады по баскетболу Андрей Макеев СКОНЧАЛСЯ АНДРЕЙ ГЕНИЕВИЧ МАКЕЕВ) was a Soviet basketball player. He played for the Soviet Union in the 1976 Summer Olympics and won a bronze medal. He was born in Petrozavodsk, Karelo-Finnish SSR, Soviet Union. Makeyev died on 13 September 2021 in Saint Petersburg, Russia at the age of 69.СКОНЧАЛСЯ АНДРЕЙ ГЕНИЕВИЧ МАКЕЕВ ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Soviet basketball players Category:People from Karelia
title: Andrey Makeyev
